faq.question: How many bullet points will I get?
faq.answer: The number varies based on document length and complexity. Typically 5-15 key points for shorter documents, 20-30 for longer reports. You can adjust detail level in settings.

faq.question: Can I customize the bullet point format?
faq.answer: Yes! Choose between brief highlights (3-5 points), standard summaries (10-15 points), or detailed breakdowns (20+ points with categories).

faq.question: Are bullet points organized by topic?
faq.answer: Absolutely. AI automatically categorizes key points by theme, making it easy to find specific information quickly.

faq.question: Can I export bullet summaries?
faq.answer: Yes! Export to PDF, Markdown, or DOCX. All formats preserve bullet structure and organization.
